attributes.action: allow us when safe to do so turn left on a red light
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having been a frequent visitor to the road safety obsessed america I have noticed how well their scheme for turning right on a red light works (obviously its right for them and left for us) its a real help for traffic congestion, I ask the goverment to allow us to turn left on a red light to help relieve traffic congestion, this should only be allowed when safe to do so, you would have to stop and give way to the right and maybe not be allowed in some built up areas, but there is no denying this would help with traffic flow with no increased safety concerns.
